Title: MY BEST FRIEND ISN’T MY FRIEND ANYMORE : A Story Exploring the Sadness of Changing Friendships
About_this_Item: My Best Friend Is Not My Friend Anymore gently guides children through the stages of grief associated with friendship breakups. This touching story offers insights on processing emotions, finding inner strength, and opening up to new beginnings. It''s a heartfelt lesson in understanding that change, though painful, brings growth.

About_this_Item: The EMOMEE My Face is Like My Mood Book is a beautifully designed early learning book that helps children understand emotions by recognizing facial expressions. As one of the best Montessori Toys & Books for Kids, this engaging Story Book introduces children to the essential skill of connecting emotions with facial cues, fostering empathy, social awareness, and emotional intelligence. Through playful storytelling and interactive activities, this Kids Toys & Activity Books set encourages self-awareness and confidence, making it a valuable addition to any child’s learning journey. With thoughtfully crafted parent prompts, this book makes learning fun and meaningful by guiding children to decode moods and develop stronger connections with those around them. Learning books like this equip kids with the ability to “read a room,” enhancing their communication skills and helping them build lasting relationships. Whether used as part of Toys & Learning Games for Kids or as an independent book for kids, EMOMEE My Face is Like My Mood Book is a must-have for every child’s early development. Keep it clean by dusting with a dry cotton cloth, and enjoy a learning experience that lasts.

About_this_Item: Introduce your little ones to the magical world of E, Mo & Mee with this delightful combo that combines the charm of storytelling with the power of positivity. Perfect as a new born baby gift or for early learners, this set includes two beautifully crafted books designed to spark joy, foster learning, and inspire young minds. The first, E, Mo & Mee Become Friends, is an engaging story books that takes children on a heartwarming journey, teaching essential social skills like sharing, taking turns, and forming meaningful friendships. With its captivating narrative and relatable characters, this early learning book nurtures teamwork, empathy, and the fundamentals of building relationships, making it an ideal Montessori book for developing emotional intelligence in young readers. Complementing the storybook is E, Mo & Mee's Little Book of Positivity, a delightful learning book filled with cheerful affirmations and "positive spells." Compact and interactive, this self-improvement book empowers kids to embrace confidence, develop positive thinking, and strengthen social bonds. Together, these books for kids provide a perfect blend of storytelling and learning, fostering emotional resilience, self-awareness, and a positive outlook on life. Whether you’re looking for thoughtful new born baby gifts, early learning books, or storybooks for young readers, this combo is a wonderful choice that will inspire smiles and nurture essential life skills.

Title: Skillmatics Sun Paper Art Kit - Mess-Free STEM Craft Kit for Kids, Design with Stencils, Create with Sunlight, Colour with Markers, Indoor, Outdoor Play, Gifts for Ages 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12
About_this_Item:
MAGICAL SUN PAPER ART KIT: Spark creativity with this science-powered craft! Arrange animal stencils on sun paper, let the sunlight work its magic for 10 minutes, and watch stunning silhouettes appear. Dip the paper in water to enhance the effect, let it dry, and then add vibrant colours with markers to complete your masterpiece!
INCLUDES: 50+ Stencils, 5 Magical Sun Papers, 8 Colourful Markers, Googly Eyes, and an Instruction Manual.
EASY TO USE: Design your scene with stencils, place it on the sun paper, and let the sunlight work its magic! After 10 minutes, dip it in water to brighten the print, let it dry, and decorate with markers and googly eyes!
INSPIRES STEM LEARNING: Discover the magic of photochemistry, light exposure, and negative imaging! This hands-on kit introduces key STEAM concepts through creativity, allowing kids to explore science and art in an exciting way.
ENCOURAGES INDEPENDENT PLAY: Kids can experiment, create, and discover how sunlight transforms their designs! This hands-on craft fosters creative thinking and curiosity, encouraging them to explore cause and effect while having fun.
BEST GIFT FOR AGES 4 TO 12: Skillmatics Magical Sun Art makes the perfect gift for kids, making it an exciting choice for birthdays, holidays, festivals, or any special occasion!
SCREEN-FREE FUN, INDOORS OR OUTDOORS!: Enjoy a creative adventure in the backyard, by a sunny window, or on vacation! This engaging, screen-free activity encourages kids to explore, experiment, and have fun with the power of sunlight.
SCIENCE MEETS MAGIC!: Sun prints use light-sensitive cyanotype paper, a process discovered by Sir John Herschel in the 1800s. When objects block sunlight, they leave behind a silhouette—just like magic! Now, kids can try it themselves and experience the wonders of science.

Title: Skillmatics Dot It Sticker Art Activity - Unicorns & Princesses, 500+ Sparkly Stickers, Mess-Free Fun for Kids, DIY Craft Kits, Travel Toys, Scrapbooking, Gifts for Ages 3, 4, 5, 6, 7
About_this_Item:
NOW WITH SPARKLY DOT STICKERS!: For the first time in the Skillmatics Dot It! range, kids can create with dazzling sparkly stickers, adding extra magic to their masterpieces!
PERFECT STICKERING ART ACTIVITY: With over 500 easy-to-peel sparkly stickers, your child will use their fine motor skills and imagination to complete 8 magical unicorn and princess-themed pictures!
INCLUDES: 30 easy-to-peel, shiny sticker sheets (500+ stickers), 4 double-sided canvases, and an instruction manual.
HOW TO USE: Let your child choose colorful shiny stickers, peel them off, and paste them onto the canvases to bring the picture to life!
NO GLUE, NO MESS! Dot It! is the perfect stickering, no-mess art activity that keeps kids engaged at home or on the go!
DEVELOP KEY SKILLS: While having fun, children develop essential skills like creative expression, pincer grasp, hand-eye coordination, and bilateral hand coordination. It's an engaging way for them to grow and learn!
ENCOURAGES INDEPENDENT PLAY: A fun way for kids to play independently, while sparking their imagination and enjoying hours of creative fun!
BEST GIFT EVER!: Makes the perfect gift for kids ages 3 to 7 who love unicorns, princesses, mermaids, and all things sparkly and magical!
